member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME= 'CustomerShipTo' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'ResidenceType' ) BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME= 'CustomerShipTo' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'AddressType' ) BEGIN -- Merge ResidenceType To AddressType DECLARE @q1 NVARCHAR(100) SET @q1 = 'UPDATE CustomerShipTo SET AddressType = ResidenceType WHERE ResidenceType <> ''Unknown''' EXEC sp_executesql @q1 END END.
